attributes.additional_details: As parents we are tired of taking responsibility for the negligent few who refuse to take action regarding their childrens head lice infestations. By reinstating the school hygiene nurse , parents could be informed directly instead of by a generic flyer at school and as such would not be able to avoid treating their children. I dont think this needs to involve excluding infested children as head lice can be dealt with quickly and effectively these days, so not infringing their rights to an education .
